resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "is_published": {
                "type": "boolean"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "is_published": "true"
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "term": {
            "is_published": True
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
